import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tooltips', templateUrl: './tooltips.component.html', }) export class AppTooltipsComponent { // disabled disabled = new FormControl(false); // show and hide showDelay = new FormControl(1000); hideDelay = new FormControl(2000); // change message message = new FormControl('Info about the action'); } Tooltips
Basic
Uppercase
Disabled on click Tooltip disabled
Position
Show and Hide
Show delay milliseconds
Hide delay milliseconds
Change Message Tooltip message
